Extensions
 AutoFill Excel-like click and drag copying and filling of data.v2.3.3

 Buttons A common framework for user interaction buttons.v1.5.6

	 Column visibility End user buttons to control column visibility.v1.5.6

 	Flash export Create Excel, PDF, CSV files and copy data from the table. For legacy browsers.v1.5.6

 	HTML5 export Copy to clipboard and create Excel, PDF and CSV files from the table's data.v1.5.6

 	JSZip Required for the Excel HTML5 export button.v2.5.0

 	pdfmake Required for the PDF HTML5 export button.v0.1.36

 	Print view Button that will display a printable view of the table.v1.5.6

 ColReorder Click-and-drag column reordering.v1.5.0

 FixedColumns Fix one or more columns to the left or right of a scrolling table.v3.2.5

 FixedHeader Sticky header and / or footer for the table.v3.1.4

 KeyTable Keyboard navigation of cells in a table, just like a spreadsheet.v2.5.0

 Responsive Dynamically show and hide columns based on the browser size.v2.2.2

 RowGroup Show similar data grouped together by a custom data point.v1.1.0

 RowReorder Click-and-drag reordering of rows.v1.2.4

 Scroller Virtual rendering of a scrolling table for large data sets.v2.0.0

 Select Adds row, column and cell selection abilities to a table.


more info
https://datatables.net/extensions/autofill/examples/initialisation/simple.html
